text: John Martin Stapleton (born 24 February 1946) is an English journalist and broadcaster. == Works == He has best known for his work as a presenter, newsreader and reporter on ITV breakfast television formerly (TV-am, GMTV, Daybreak and the programmes's successor Good Morning Britain), as well as hosting Nationwide and Watchdog for the BBC. Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:English journalists
title: John Stapleton (English journalist)
